title: Earth.Girls.Are.Easy.DVDrip.Xvid.AC3-stoffinho17 (Jim Carrey)
description:
This is a Jim Carrey movie early in his carer, that was produced in 1988.

CD Covers:
Front (USA)
CD (USA)
Inside (USA)


An out-of-this-world, down-to earth comedy adventure.

Need a lift? Then you're invited to get wild in an out-of-this-world party called Earth Girls Are Easy! Jim Carrey, Geena Davis, Jeff Goldblum, and Julie Brown co-star in this musical comedy that "alienates" you in the most wonderful way.
Three furry aliens, played by Jeff Goldblum and stand-up comedians Jim Carrey and Damon Wayans, splash down in Valerie's (Geena Davis) pool, finding that life hero on earth is more than just fun, fun, fun - it's also romance, dancing, TV, adventure, music...and makeovers. The extraterrestrial trio have no idea how wild earth girls can be...but they're about to fing out.
Three aliens are set free in Los Angeles for a wild weekend that you've got to see to belive. Get ready to Earth Girls Are Easy because this is gonna be fun.
